name: Kikky Badass
description: '''Christabell Stembeni Mahlungwa''' (born April 15, 1995), professionally known as '''Kikky Badass''', is a Zimbabwean rapper and singer-songwriter. She gained notoriety in 2017 after the release of her music video to "Body Conversations," a song which is featured on her debut album titled ''Queen of The South''.
